SEARCH
Module com.example.cab222a
Package com.example.cab222a.dao.resist_train

Class ExerciseInfoDAO

java.lang.Object
com.example.cab222a.dao.core.AbstractObjectDAO<ExerciseInfo>
com.example.cab222a.dao.resist_train.ExerciseInfoDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
IObjectDAO<ExerciseInfo>
public class ExerciseInfoDAO extends AbstractObjectDAO<ExerciseInfo>
ExerciseInfoDAO class is used to handle CRUD operations related to the ExerciseInfo SQL table in the database. This class provides methods for adding, updating, retrieving, searching and finding alternative ExerciseInfo.

    • searchExerciseInfo

      public List<ExerciseInfo> searchExerciseInfo(String query)
      Searches for exercises that match the query string. Search looks for matches in the exercise name, primary muscle group or secondary muscle group.
      Parameters:
      query - The search query string
      Returns:
      A list of ExerciseInfo objects that match the query.

    • createTable

      public void createTable()
      Creates the exerciseInfo table in the database if it does not exist. If the table is created and empty, default exercises are added ot the table.
      Overrides:
      createTable in class AbstractObjectDAO<ExerciseInfo>

    • findAlternatives

      public List<ExerciseInfo> findAlternatives(String exerciseName)
      Finds alternative exercises based on the target exercise's primary and secondary muscle group.
      Parameters:
      exerciseName - The name of the target exercise to find alternatives of.
      Returns:
      The list of alternative exercises of the target exercise.
